body_html:
It's reasonable for the example model to start with a 1 channel image.

But this variable_scope.md doc was just merged into variables.md, so accepting this now would just set us up for a merge conflict when the sync happens.

If you want to update variables.md after the sync, that's fine with me.
body_text:
It's reasonable for the example model to start with a 1 channel image.
But this variable_scope.md doc was just merged into variables.md, so accepting this now would just set us up for a merge conflict when the sync happens.
If you want to update variables.md after the sync, that's fine with me.
body:
It's reasonable for the example model to start with a 1 channel image.

But this `variable_scope.md` doc was just merged into `variables.md`, so accepting this now would just set us up for a merge conflict when the sync happens.

If you want to update `variables.md` after the sync, that's fine with me.
